data.title: BellalunaMcKenzie
data.meta_description: BellalunaMcKenzie is a fanfiction author that has written 20 stories for Roswell, Passions, Harry Potter, Guiding Light, and Tudors.
data.text:
Author has written 20 stories for Roswell, Passions, Harry Potter, Guiding Light, and Tudors.

What you'll find in my profile...

1. A word from the author

2. Real-life info

3. Index and status of my stories.

1.

Hey, I'm finally back to writing!! I know my break was long but it was much needed. A special thanks to all the reviewers who were patient enough to wait for my return.

As you've probably noticed, I've done a major cleanup of my stories, erasing the ones I will most likely never finish (albeit keeping them archived on my computer so I can potentially grab parts of them to insert in ongoing fics), updating some infos of the ones I've already finished and selected the few I intend to work on.

Likewise, I've updated my profile so you can sound off on which fiction you'd like me to finish first in the poll I've just started.

2.

Little tid bits of info if you want to know about me...

Favorite soaps: Passions (even if it's off the air, kinda hard to let it go since I've watched it from beginning to end), Guiding Light (another show going off the air soon), One Life to Live, As The World Turns, General Hospital, Days of our Lives (with Galen, Eric and Lindsay back, how could I not watch, right?)

Favorite shows: Roswell (lasted 3 seasons), Dawson's Creek (lasted 5 or 6 seasons), Buffy the Vampire Slayer (lasted 7 seasons), Smallville (how could I miss watching Justin Hartley in action?), sometimes Gossip Girls

Favorite books: Twilight (all four), Da Vinci Code/Angels and Demons, Hidden Passions, the various Pharaoh trilogies from Violaine Vanoyeke, The Chronicles of Narnia (all seven), Harry Potter (all seven)

Favorite video games: The Legend of Zelda (Ocarina of Time/Majora's Mask/Twilight Princess), Final Fantasy VII and VIII, Mario Golf 64 (to relax), Mario Kart 64 (to beat the hell out of my husband :P), Soul Blade (idem)

Favorite movies: adaptations from Twilight/Da Vinci Code/Angels and Demons/Narnia/Queen of the Damned/The Mists of Avalon, Saw (all of them), Stargate (the first, Continuum and the Ark of Truth), The Mummy, The Mummy returns, The Scorpion King, The Scorpion King 2, Where the Red Fern grows, Because of Winn-Dixie

Favorite artist: Dave Matthews Band, Linkin Park, Evanescence, Enigma, Era, Disturbed, Korn

Favorite actor/actress: Lindsay Hartley (daytime), Julianna Margulies/Kristen Stewart (movie), Steve Burton/Justin Hartley (daytime/primetime), Robert Pattinson/Dave Matthews (movie)

Characters I love to write about...

Female: Theresa Lopez-Fitzgerald/Fancy Crane (PSSN), Lizzie Spaulding (GL), Katie Peretti (ATWT), Liz Webber (GH), Greenlee Smythe (AMC), Gigi Morasco (OLTL), Sami Brady (DAYS), Liz Parker (Roswell)

Male: Fox Crane/sometimes Ethan Winthrop/Luis Lopez-Fitzgerald (PSSN), Jonathan Randall/Bill Lewis III (GL), Henry Coleman (ATWT), Jason Morgan/Sonny Corinthos (GH), Ryan Lavery/Zach Slater (AMC), Rex Balsom (OLTL), Brady Black/EJ Dimera (DAYS), Max Evans (Roswell)

Character I love to hate and write about...

Female: Gwen Hotchkiss/Rebecca Hotchkiss/Whitney Russell (PSSN), Ava Peralta/Tammy Winslow-Layne (GL), Sam McCall (GH), Kendall Hart/Annie Novak (AMC), Stacy Morasco/Adrianna Cramer (OLTL), Nicole Walker/Chloe Lane (DAYS), Tess Harding (Roswell)

Male: more often than not Ethan Winthrop (PSSN), Lucky Spencer/Ric Lansing (GH), Khivar (Roswell)

3. Index and status of my stories (in alphabetical order)

A day in a life: COMPLETE This is the way I've always imagined TheRox's wedding... One-shot fic. Fox/Theresa

Acceptance: COMPLETE Fox makes a decision about his future. See how Julian reacts... One-shot short fic. Fox/Theresa

Back Then: COMPLETE A past life of Gwen, Ethan, Theresa and Fox. One-shot fic... Fox/Theresa

Be strong for us: COMPLETE Sequel to 'Acceptance'. Julian finally realizes who he truly loves and finds a friend in someone unexpected... One-shot short fic. Julian/Theresa

Fathers are forever: COMPLETE Martin picks up a letter his daughter Theresa had put at the feet of his tombstone on the 18th anniversary of his 'death'... One-shot fic. Martin/Theresa

Following the heart: COMPLETE Despite all the warnings, Theresa went head first into her fairytale dream of being Ethan's wife. Many years later, she does something she never thought she'd do. One-shot fic. Fox/Theresa Revision needed to up the writing quality.

From the inside: COMPLETE Theresa finally sees Ethan's true colors and gives him a piece of her mind. Ethan-bashing. For Theresa and Gwen fans... One-shot fic. A little bit different from the show. Gwen/Theresa Revision needed to up the writing quality.

Full Circle: IN-PROGRESS/ON HOLD An AU TheRoxJaresa fic...set in the future. No summary, you have to read and find out. Fox/Theresa

Gwen's downfall: COMPLETE Gwen's hatred reached a new level when she began to choke the death out of Theresa. What is everything would have happened differently? Slightly AU Fox/Theresa Revision needed to up the writing quality.

I trusted you: COMPLETE An entry of Kay's journal is found by her daughter Maria... One-shot fic. Kay/Miguel

Lonely too long: COMPLETE Noah comes to term with his feelings for his friend as he greets the morning at her side.. One-shot fic. Noah/Theresa

Return to me: COMPLETE Any memories of Luis have been erased from Sheridan's brain but what will happen when he calls to her through her dreams? Will love conquer Alistair and Antonio's evil plan to keep them apart? Sheridan/Luis

Stay or leave: COMPLETE Theresa Lopez-Fitzgerald thought she would be free of her worst enemy, Gwen Hotchkiss, when she'd be Mrs. Ethan Crane. Oh Almighty God was she wrong! Ethan/Theresa

The next generation: Dark Secrets: IN-PROGRESS/ON HOLD Hogwarts welcomes Lily Potter, Harry's daughter, and Darren Malfoy, Draco's son, this year. Soon enough, strange things begin to happen. Will history repeat itself? Lily/Darren

The Royal Eight: IN-PROGRESS/ON HOLD/BEING ENTIRELY REWRITTEN DIFFERENTLY The truth lies beyond the invisible... Those words haunted Max for weeks. What truth? They would all soon find out... Liz/Max

Time to move on: IN-PROGRESS Theresa was hurt one too many times. And now, she's getting her revenge on all those who have wronged her... Fox/Theresa

True to himself: COMPLETE Ethan is finally being true to himself... One-shot fic with some changes in the GET storyline. Ethan/Theresa

What have I done?: IN-PROGRESS/ON HOLD Much to his surprise, Jonathan Randall isn't too happy about Lizzie being married to Coop. But what he doesn't realize yet is that he, and only he, has the power to change the situation. Slightly AU. Jonathan/Lizzie

What I can't give: COMPLETE One of Ethan and Theresa's past lives in which he asks of her the only thing she can't give him...herself. One-shot fic. Ethan/Theresa

You should know: COMPLETE Sequel to 'Following the heart'. Back in Milan after her middle son's wedding, Theresa is touched by a letter she receives from Ethan. One-shot fic. Fox/Theresa

As you can see, I've removed many stories, including one hugely popular (Inheritance). No to worry, fans of that particular fiction, I'll use many of its content in future chapters of Time to move on. I felt it was better to fusion these two than write almost exactly the same thing. Anyhow, don't forget to vote on my polls (One for TTMO and another to determine which one you'd love to see me finish first.

Enjoy!
